All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a single card in the UNO game.
CardEffect
Represents a wrapper for a card's effect in the UNO game.
ColorEffect
Represents the effect of a "Color Change" card in the UNO game.
CurrentColorListener
Listener interface for tracking changes to the current color in the Uno game.
Deck
Represents the Uno deck used during the game.
DrawFourEffect
Represents the effect of a "Draw Four" card in the UNO game.
DrawTwoEffect
Represents the effect of a "Draw Two" card in the UNO game.
EISCUnoEnum
Enum EISCUnoEnum This enum represents the various file paths for the images used in the EISC Uno game.
EmptyDeck
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to draw a card from an empty deck in the Uno game.
GameOverListener
Listener interface for monitoring when the Uno game ends.
GameState
Class GameState
GameStateEnum
Represents the possible states of an ongoing UNO game.
GameUno
Represents a full game of Uno, extending the base logic provided by GameUnoAdapter.
GameUnoAdapter
Abstract adapter class implementing the basic logic and rules of an UNO game.
GameUnoController
Controller for managing the main Uno game scene.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
ICardEffect
Represents the behavior of a special card effect in the UNO game.
IGameUno
Interface representing the Uno game functionality.
IPlaneTextFileHandler
Interface IPlaneTextFileHandler
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
ISerializableFileHandler
Interface ISerializableFileHandler
MachinePlayListener
Listener interface for monitoring the machine player's actions during the game.
Main
The main class of the EISC Uno application.
NonPlayableCard
Exception thrown when a player attempts to play a card that is not valid according to the game rules.
PlaneTextFileHandler
Class PlaneTextFileHandler
Player
Represents a player in the Uno game.
SerializableFileHandler
Class SerializableFileHandler
ShapeDrawer
Utility class responsible for drawing composite shapes used in the UNO game interface.
SkipEffect
Represents the effect of a "Skip" card in the UNO game.
Table
Represents the table in the Uno game where cards are played.
ThreadCurrentColorMachine
Class ThreadCurrentColorMachine
ThreadPlayMachine
Class ThreadPlayMachine
ThreadSingUnoMachine
Class ThreadSingUnoMachine
TurnEnum
Enum TurnEnum
UnoEventListener
Listener interface for UNO events in the game.
WelcomeStage
Represents the welcome window (stage) of the UNO game application.
WelcomeStageController
Controller for the Welcome Stage of the Uno game.
